raw_body:
CHELLIAH SIVANESAN (KINGSLY) – (Retired Draughtsman,​ Survey Department). Son of late Chelliah and Alagusundari,​ son-in-law of late Thillainayagam and Pakiyaluxmi,​ loving husband of late Sasidevi Sivanesan (former Principal Hindu Ladies College,​ Colombo),​ loving father of Sarangan (USA),​ Seyon (Singapore),​ loving father-in-law of Charlotte Emily Metcalfe,​ loving grandfather of Ari Theo Sivanesan and Jai Stanley Sivanesan,​ brother of Sivakumari,​ Kamalasani,​ Naguleswaran (Rexy),​ Vasanthakumari and late Manoharan,​ Paskaran,​ Vigneswaran,​ Rajeswaran,​ passed away peacefully on Thursday,​ May 16,​ 2024. Viewing will be held on Saturday,​ May 18,​ 2024 from 10.00 a.m. to 6.00 p.m. & funeral on Sunday,​ May 19,​ 2024 at 11.00 a.m. at Jayaratne Parlour,​ Borella followed by cremation at General Cemetery,​ Borella. Sarangan & Seyon.
033568
